topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5529bd926368725edaa71800#post_5529bd926368725edaa71800
People already draw kaiju as moe girls:
!http://th06.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/i/2014/154/5/a/godzilla_by_gamerag3-d7kw08c.jpg!

Before kantai the "in" thing in anime was to draw mecha or war machines as moe girls then came along kantai, while I'm not a fan of the anime it is extremely popular, and now people are turning everything moe.  I would be surprised if there's a moe kaiju anime eventually.


Tl:dr; fans would personify military machinery and now we have kanta; now people are personifying kaiju as moe girls so chances are that's next.

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5529beaa63687262b8851b00#post_5529beaa63687262b8851b00
It just goes to show that moe is the new popular thing.



The whole "anime is ruined 5 ever" thing is kind of stupid cause honestly look back on anime from 2000 to 2015; was anime _really_ the mona lisa of creative endeavor to shine upon the masses a higher form of art so as to help the viewers reach enlightenment?
No)Moe is just the latest trend; trends only last for about a decade.  If you don't like moe then anime will move onto the new thing in about a decade.
Yes)That's some strong ass kool-aid bro.
